original_text: So likewise ye, when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants: we have done that which was our duty to do.
korean_text: 이와 같이 너희도 명령 받은 것을 다 행한 후에 이르기를 우리는 무익한 종이라 우리가 하여야 할 일을 한 것뿐이라 할지니라

sentences.original_text: when ye shall have done all those things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그 모든 것을 행하였을 때에

sentences.original_text: we have done that which was our duty to do
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 마땅히 할 일을 하였을 뿐입니다
